quotes.quote: When it comes to cars, only two varieties of people are possible - cowards and fools.
A racing car is an animal with a thousand adjustments.
I couldn't find the sports car of my dreams, so I built it myself.
A car is like a mother-in-law - if you let it, it will rule your life.
Cars are the sculptures of our everyday lives.
I thought cars were essential ingredients of life itself.
There's no way we could take cars off the planet and not have our society fall apart. So they're a necessary evil, in that sense.
The car has become the carapace, the protective and aggressive shell, of urban and suburban man.
All of those cars were once just a dream in somebody's head.
Electric cars are not going to take the market by storm, but it's going to be a gradual improvement.
Electric cars aren't pollution-free; they have to get their energy from somewhere.
We aren't addicted to oil, but our cars are.
Fast cars like Porsches and Ferraris - they are things of beauty.
Flying cars are not a very efficient way to move things from one point to another.
There's nothing wrong with the car except that it's on fire.
Never lend your car to anyone to whom you have given birth.
You can know or not know how a car runs and still enjoy riding in a car.
Race cars, no matter what size or shape they are, they do the same things. It is not complicated.
Generally, cars were not built to sit on dealer lots. It encourages the wrong kind of behavior in the whole system.
I've always been into cars. Cars are part of our genetic makeup. It's unavoidable.
Cars are the reason we, you know, people live or die.
Self-driving cars are the natural extension of active safety and obviously something we should do.
I think about cars to try and distract myself. It's a good way to relax, take your mind off everything.
Cars bring me sheer joy.
I love vintage cars because you can do so much more to them.
Fast cars are my only vice.
When you are fitted in a racing car and you race to win, second or third place is not enough.
I hooked up my accelerator pedal in my car to my brake lights. I hit the gas, people behind me stop, and I'm gone.
Car designers are just going to have to come up with an automobile that outlasts the payments.
Driving race cars was an avenue for me to learn how to build my own car, and that was my ambition all along.
In less enlightened times, the best way to impress women was to own a hot car. But women wised up and realized it was better to buy their own hot cars so they wouldn't have to ride around with jerks.
You're safer in the race car than you are in cars going to and from the track.
It's like driving a car at night. You never see further than your headlights, but you can make the whole trip that way.
I would never kill a living thing, although I probably have inadvertently while driving automobiles.
We approach people the same way we approach our cars. We take the poor kid to a doctor and ask, What's wrong with him, how much will it cost, and when can I pick him up?
Google is working on self-driving cars, and they seem to work. People are so bad at driving cars that computers don't have to be that good to be much better.
A car is not a bedroom on wheels.
We can't stop the car, Henry. It's the getaway car.
Ultimately when buying a car, keep one question uppermost in mind. How am I going to feel when I'm standing in front of a restaurant? The ballet brings me my car.
I know it breaks your heart / Moved to the city in a broke down car
Have you ever had a ride in a light blue car? / Have you ever stopped to think / who's the slave and who's the master?
Have you ever had trouble with your automobile? / Have you ever had to push push push push? / Car Trouble, oh yeah!
I live for cars and girls, cars and girls / There's nothing else in this crazy world / Except for cars and a good, good, good girls
Here in my car / I feel safest of all / I can lock all my doors / It's the only way to live / In cars
Cars are cars / All over the world / Similarly made / Similarly sold / In a motorcade / Abandoned when they're old
If some of my homes / Had been more like my car / I probably wouldn't have / Traveled this far
I once had a car / That was more like a home / I lived in it, loved in it / Polished its chrome
As I understand, this car is grand, it's a leader in its field  / So! Though simple it seems to drive easily, and the guarantee is sealed
Don't wonder how to drive this car, just a simple simple rule to know, know that  / You should drive at the maximum speed, because we don't want to get bored!
In a getaway car, oh-oh / No, they never get far, oh-oh-ahh / No, nothing good starts  / In a getaway car
You were driving  / The getaway car / We were flying / But we'd never get far
A car is a very complicated machine.
In popular culture cars signify the product, not the business activity of making and selling the product.
Cars are potent symbols and accessories which are consumed world wide in image if not substance.
The activity of making and selling cars is nevertheless of massive practical importance and considerable intellectual interest.
Overnight travel in early railroad cars was an unpleasant trial.
Racing was a great way to test new-car technology.
Good balance is a must for a good sports car.
Cars, trucks, and buses are modern-day variants of the old four-wheel carts and carriages.
The sports car, designed for pleasure, was particularly new to young Americans.
Wheeled vehicles have made life easier for mankind. since their first appearance.
There are a number of inventions that have changed the course of history. One of the most significant among their numbers is the wheel.
But the last great transport inventions---the railways, the motor car, the motor bus, and the airplane--all took place in less than one hundred years.
There is a lot of support for an attractive alternative to the car in cities.
Can the kid who grew up desperately wanting a car actually live without one? Increasingly, the answer is yes.
Car sharing would allow me to have all the benefits of having a car when I need one without the hassles of owning one.
I don't need a car very often, car sharing holds a good deal or appeal.
Cars are symbols of authority and exclusivity.
Clearly it is in the economic realm that the car has had its most direct impact on society.
Cars are sold with sex and symbols. They impart meanings to their owners that are both resonant with and influential upon the meanings of life itself.
As has been seen, for many car ownership was only possible by combining incomes or making savings elsewhere is family spending.
If you take charge of your car, it will take care of you. It won't leave you stranded, broke, brokenhearted, or bewildered.
Before you buy a car, you must consider a world of choices.
Hybrid cars weren't designed for better economy. No matter the hype, they were designed to protect the environment. Great fuel economy is a bonus.
A car costs a lot of money! People should take their time and learn as much as they can before they spend a large amount of money on any item, including a car.
People are passionate about their cars. Drivers compare many makes and models when they are shopping for a car.
